All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AlreadyJoinedPlayersMessage
This message transfers the set of the players already in the game
BagHolder
BagHolder represent the bag used to draw the tiles to put on the LivingRoomBoard
BoardListener
provides updates of the board state
BoardListenerTest
Tests for the class BoardListener
BoardSubscriber
the interface that provides the method to be implemented by an observer of the board
BoardUpdateMessage
This message transfers updates concerning the livingRoom board
Bookshelf
the bookshelf class stores the tiles taken by the players in the game, it can also been use for a bookshelf pattern reference in cards
BookshelfListener
provides to the client information about a bookshelf of a player
BookshelfListenerTest
Tests for the class BookshelfListener
BookshelfSubscriber
the interface that provides the method to be implemented by an observer of the bookshelf
BookshelfUpdateMessage
This message transfers updates about the bookshelf of a player
BrokenInternalGameConfigurations
Exception launched if some internal configurations of the game are broken
CardBookshelf
cardBookshelf is an immutable extension of the bookshelf class, that make it possible to create a pattern used in personal cards
Chat
The Chat class stores all the messages sent by all the player inside a game, either in public or in private chat
ChatListener
the chatListener is used to notify the client about the new messages posted
ChatListenerTest
Tests for the class ChatListener
ChatSubscriber
the interface that provides the method to be implemented by an observer of the chat service
CheckPattern
the CheckPattern common card is used to verify that a certain pattern is respected in the card.
ClientRMI
This is the class that implements the communication with the server through RMI
ClientRMITest
Tests for the ClientRMI class
ClientSocket
This is the class that implements the communication with the server through TCP
CLITest
Tests for the CLI class
CliView
Main class for managing the client over CLI
CloseConnectionMessage
This message transfers the communication about the end of the connection between server and client
Color
Types of color used on the CLI during the game
CommonCardType
Different types of CommonGoalCard
CommonGoalCard
CommonGoalCard is an abstract class used to represent the common cards of the game.
CommonGoalCardsUpdateMessage
This message transfers the communication of an update about the CommonGoalCards of the game
CommonGoalCardTest
Tests for the CommonGoalCard class
ConfirmChatMessage
This message acts as a confirmation message that a chat communication has been sent successfully/ has failed
ConfirmGameMessage
This message is sent to inform the client about the creation of a game
ConfirmMessage
This is an abstract type of message sent as confirmation to some operations
ConfirmMoveMessage
This message is used to confirm a Move operation
ConfirmSelectionMessage
This message is used to confirm a selection Operation
ConnectionHandler
This is the interface that handles all the communication methods, it will be implemented by the two classes that handles the connection with RMI and TCP
ConnectionHandlerFactory
This is the class that is in charge of creating the desired connection type, either TCP or RMI
ConnectionHandlerTCP
ConnectionHandlerTCP is a class used to manage the connection to a client when connected over TCP.
ConnectionHandlerTest
 
ConnectionType
Enum of the supported connection types
Coordinates
the Coordinates class is a useful and immutable class used in many method
CoordinatesTest
Class used to test Coordinates class
CreateGameMessage
This message represents the request to create a game
DeckCommon
DeckCommon is an implementation of the Distributable interface, it deals with commonCards, It can be used to draw common cards.
DeckPersonal
DeckPersonal is an implementation of the Distributable interface, it deals with personalCards, It can be used to draw personal cards.
Distributable<T>
Distributable is an interface used for collections of elements that must be distributed, such as cards or tiles.
EmptySlotException
Exception launched if a coordinates results to an empty slot
FiveXTiles
FiveXtiles is a common card that requires an X made of 5 tiles as the goal.
FiveXTilesTest
Tests for the FiveXTiles class
FullColumns
FullColumns is a common card type that requires a column pattern
FullColumnsTest
Tests for the FullColumn class
FullRows
the fullRows common card check that a bookshelf contains a minimum of nRows full rows which follow a specific rule
FullRowsTest
 
Game
This is the class that handles all the logic of the game and its status
Game
This class is used to handle the main logic of a Game
GameController
the game controller ensures the communication through client controller and server model
GameControllerTest
Tests for the GameController class
GameEndedException
Exception launched if the game is ended and a player is trying to perform an action
GameListener
the GameListener is used to notify the client about updates concerning the game
GameListenerTest
Tests for the GameListener class
GameModelInterface
This interface contains all the methods that can be called from the GameController
GameNotEndedException
Exception launched if the game is not ended and the player seek details about an ended game (such as the winner)
GameNotStartedException
Exception launched if the Game still has to start and a player tries to perform an action
GameReceivedMessage
This message is used to confirm by the client that the reference to the game has been received successfully
GameState
This ENUM specifies all the States where a game could be found.
GameStateListener
the GameStateListener is used to notify the client about updates concerning the state of the game
GameStateSubscriber
the interface that provides the method to be implemented by an observer of game state
GameStatusMessage
This message transfers updated about the state of the game
GameSubscriber
the interface that provides the method to be implemented by an observer of the Game
GameTest
Class used to test Game class
GameViewController
Controller for the GUI when a user is in a game
GUIController
This is the abstract class for the GUIControllers
GUILaunch
This class launches the GuiView's main method
GUIView
Gui Application Class
IllegalFilePathException
Exception launched if the FilePath given is invalid
InvalidCoordinatesException
Exception launched if the coordinates passed are invalid
InvalidPlayerException
Exception launched if the player username is invalid
ItemTile
The item tile class is an ENUM class used to recognize the possible types of tiles.
JoinGameMessage
This message transfers s request to join the game
JoinLobbyMessage
This message transfers the request of joining the lobby
Launch
Hello world!
Listener<T extends ListenerSubscriber>
the abstract and generic class that describe a listener
ListenerSubscriber
a listener observer is a class that observe a listener in order to receive a status update by a certain class listened
LivingRoomBoard
LivingRoomBoard represent the living room board and implements all the methods necessary
LivingRoomBoardTest
Tests for the LivingRoomBoard class
Lobby
the lobby is where players can be assigned to game which are not already started.
LobbyController
the lobby controller ensures the communication through client controller and server model
LobbyTest
Class used to test Lobby class
LobbyViewController
Controller class of the GUI when a user is in the lobby
LoginReturnMessage
This message transfers the result of a login request
MarioPyramid
MarioPyramid is a common card type that requires a pattern similar to a pyramid
MarioPyramidTest
Tests for the MarioPyramid class
Message
Message class represent a single message sent by a user privately or globally
MessageType
Enum representing all the type of messages sent over the network
MoveTilesMessage
This message transfers the request of moving tiles
NadjacentElements
NadjacentElements is a common card type that requires the adjacency of tiles
NadjacentElementsTest
Tests for the NadjacenctElements class
NegativeFieldException
Exception launched if negative values are passed to a method that requires positive arguments
NequalsSquares
NequalsSquares is a common card type that requires that the tiles are arranged in a square
NequalsSquaresTest
Tests for the NequalsSquares class
NetMessage
Abstract structure of a NetMessage
NewPlayerInGame
This message updated the client that a new player joined the game
NicknameAlreadyUsedException
Exception launched if a user tries to log with a username already used
NoAvailableGameException
Exception launched if a player tries to join a game but there's no game available in the lobby
NotAllPlayersHaveJoinedException
Exception launched if it's asked for the game to start but not all the players have joined yet
NotEnoughCardsException
Exception launched if the number of cards read from the JSON is not enough to draw the nElements cards
NotEnoughSpaceException
Exception launched if the number of elements required can't fit the dimension of the container (bookshelf)
NotEnoughTilesException
Exception launched if the tiles given are not enough to fill the container
Notifications
 
NotifyNewChatMessage
This message notifies the client that a new chat message has been recived
NotifyPlayerCrashedMessage
This message notifies a client that another player crashed
NotifyPlayerInTurnMessage
This message notifies the turn of a player to the client
NotifyTurnOrder
This message trnasfers to the client the full turn order
NotifyWinnerPlayerMessage
This message notifies the client that a player won the game
NsameTiles
NSameTiles is a common card type that requires a certain number of equals tiles inside the bookshelf
NSameTilesTest
Tests for the NSameTiles class
PersonalGoalCard
PersonalGoalCard represent the card assigned to a specific player.
PersonalGoalCardUpdateMessage
This message notifies to the client an update in the personal goal card
Player
The player class represent a single player globally with also attributes used inside a game such as PlayerBookshelf, TokenAcquired and PersonalGoalCard
PlayerBookshelf
the player bookshelf extends the bookshelf class, it is a mutable class, used for stores players tiles
PlayerListener
listener of the Player class, it provides to observers information about the player change of state
PlayerListenerTest
 
PlayerNotFoundException
Exception launched if the player is not found
PlayerNotInTurnException
Exception launched if a player tries to perform an action outside his turn
PlayersNumberOutOfRange
Exception launched if the number of player is outside the admissible range
PlayerSubscriber
the interface that provides the method to be implemented by an observer of the Player
PointsUpdateMessage
This message transfers an update in the points of a player
PostMessage
This message is used to send a message a chat message from the client
RemoteCommonGoalCard
This interface specifies the methods exposed by a CommonGoalCard either over RMI or TCP
RemoteGameController
This interface represents the methods exposed by the GameController over RMI
RemoteLobbyController
This interface represents the methods exposed by the LobbyController over RMI
RemotePersonalGoalCard
This interface specifies the methods exposed by a PersonalGoalCard either over RMI or TCP
ReschedulableTimer
Class used to implement a timer that could be rescheduled before it expires
Scenario
enum with the types of scene with the rendering attributes (dimensions).
SceneType
Enum with the different types of scene in the view
ScoringToken
scoring token is a class that represent the token placed on common cards
SenderEqualsRecipientException
Exception launched if the sender and the recipient of a private message are the same user
ServerMain
This is the main class of the Server, it launches both RMI and TCP Services to accept clients' requests.
Slot
Every slot represents a cell of the board
SlotFullException
Exception launched if the slot where it's required to insert a tile is already full
SlotType
Different types of slot BASIC for normal slots ATLEAST3 for slots that are active only in games with 3 or more players ATLEAST4 for slots that are active only in games with 4 or more players NOTCELL for slots that are never in use
StillActiveMessage
This message is to notify that the connection is still active
TileSelectionMessage
This message transfers the tile selection to the server
TokenAlreadyGivenException
Exception launched if we try to assign a token to a player that has already received it
TokenPoint
the tokenPoint enums represent the possible values of the tokens placed on the common cards
TokenUpdateMessage
This message notifies the client about the update of the tokens owned by a player
UtilityFunctions
Class that contains some values and methods used by multiple classes
ViewInterface
Interface used to define all the possible methods that need a view rendering.
